doc.previous: Classical variables that do not change upon time reversal include  In physical and chemical kinetics T symmetry of the mechanical microscopic equations implies two important laws the principle of detailed balance and the Onsager reciprocal relations T symmetry of the microscopic description together with its kinetic consequences are called microscopic reversibility
